title: Bird House Model, "Carlyle Hotel", 2002
inscribed: with presentation paper on bottom "The Carlyle Hotel/ Painted by Richard Haas /Presented to Bobby Short /2002
provenance: 2012, From Eugene V. and Clare Thaw, purchased from the Bobby Short sale at Sotheby's New York, Gift to Bobby Short from the Carlyle Hotel, 2002.
dimensions:
H x W x D: 48.9 x 16.5 x 26.7 cm (19 1/4 x 6 1/2 x 10 1/2 in.)
With bird nest: H x W x D: 48.9 x 16.5 x 33 cm (19 1/4 in. x 6 1/2 in. x 13 in.)
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: modelled and painted in beige and pinkish beige replicating the tower of the Carlyle Hotel in New York, with a hole in center and wood peg below for the birds

tombstone.epitaph:
Bird House Model, "Carlyle Hotel", 2002.
2002. wood, paint. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2013-3-7.
